00030 // GTplus sigma tau+
00031 ManyBodyOperator OpGTplus = {
00032   name : "GTplus",
00033   rank : 2,
00034   pi : 0,
00035   dim : 1,
00036   size : 1,
00037   par : NULL,
00038   me : calcGTplusod
00039 };
00040 
00041 // GTminus sigma tau-
00042 ManyBodyOperator OpGTminus = {
00043   name : "GTminus",
00044   rank : 2,
00045   pi : 0,
00046   dim : 1,
00047   size : 1,
00048   par : NULL,
00049   me : calcGTminusod
00050 };
00051 
00052 
00053 static void ob_gtplus(void* par,
00054                       const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00055                       const GaussianAux* X, complex double gtp[3])
00056 {
00057   int i;
00058 
00059   if (G1->xi == 1 && G2->xi == -1)
00060     for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00061       gtp[i] += X->sig[i]*X->R;
00062 }
00063 
00064 
00065 static void ob_gtminus(void* par,
00066                        const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00067                        const GaussianAux* X, complex double gtm[3])
00068 {
00069   int i;
00070 
00071   if (G1->xi == -1 && G2->xi == 1)
00072     for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00073       gtm[i] += X->sig[i]*X->R;
00074 }

00077 
00078 void calcGTplusod(void* Par,
00079                   const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDet* Qp,
00080                   const SlaterDetAux* X, 
00081                   complex double GTplus[3])
00082 {
00083   complex double gtp[3];
00084 
00085   OneBodyOperator op_ob_gtp = {dim: 3, opt: 0, par: NULL, me: ob_gtplus};
00086 
00087   // SlaterDetAux X calculated by calcSlaterDetAuxodSingular needed here
00088   calcSlaterDetOBMEod(Q, Qp, X, &op_ob_gtp, gtp);
00089 
00090   // spherical components -1, 0, +1
00091   GTplus[0] =   sqrt(0.5)*(gtp[0] - I*gtp[1]);
00092   GTplus[1] =   gtp[2];
00093   GTplus[2] = - sqrt(0.5)*(gtp[0] + I*gtp[1]);
00094 }
00095 
00096 
00097 void calcGTminusod(void* Par,
00098                    const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDet* Qp,
00099                    const SlaterDetAux* X, 
00100                    complex double GTminus[3])
00101 {
00102   complex double gtm[3];
00103 
00104   OneBodyOperator op_ob_gtm = {dim: 3, opt: 0, par: NULL, me: ob_gtminus};
00105 
00106   calcSlaterDetOBMEod(Q, Qp, X, &op_ob_gtm, gtm);
00107 
00108   // spherical components -1, 0, +1
00109   GTminus[0] =   sqrt(0.5)*(gtm[0] - I*gtm[1]);
00110   GTminus[1] =   gtm[2];
00111   GTminus[2] = - sqrt(0.5)*(gtm[0] + I*gtm[1]);
00112 }

00116 #define SQR(x) ((x)*(x))
00117 
00118 
00119 void writeprojectedtransitions(FILE* fp,
00120                                const Projection* P,
00121                                int rank, int pi,
00122                                const char* label, const char* unit,
00123                                const complex double**** transme,
00124                                const Eigenstates* Efin, 
00125                                const Eigenstates* Eini)
00126 {
00127   int odd = P->odd;
00128   int jmax = P->jmax;
00129 
00130   int pini, jini, pfin, jfin;
00131   int idxini, idxfin;
00132   int *idxi, *idxf;
00133   int i, f;
00134   double B;
00135 
00136   for (pini=0; pini<=1; pini++)
00137     for (jini=odd; jini<jmax; jini=jini+2) {
00138       pfin = (pini+pi)%2;
00139       for (jfin=abs(jini-rank); jfin<=min(jini+rank,jmax-1); jfin=jfin+2) {
00140 
00141         idxini = idxpij(jmax,pini,jini);
00142         idxfin = idxpij(jmax,pfin,jfin);
00143 
00144         if (Eini->ngood[idxini] == 0 || Efin->ngood[idxfin] == 0)
00145             
00146           continue;
00147 
00148         idxi = Eini->index[idxini];
00149         idxf = Efin->index[idxfin];
00150 
00151         if (P->odd) fprintf(fp, "\n\n %s [%d/2%c] <- [%d/2%c] (%s)\n\n",
00152                             label, jfin, pfin ? '-' : '+', 
00153                             jini, pini ? '-' : '+', unit);
00154         else        fprintf(fp, "\n\n %s [%d%c] <- [%d%c] (%s)\n\n",
00155                             label, jfin/2, pfin ? '-' : '+', 
00156                             jini/2, pini ? '-' : '+', unit);
00157 
00158         fprintf(fp, "%14c", ' ');
00159         for (i=0; i<Eini->ngood[idxini]; i++) 
00160           fprintf(fp, "%10.3f MeV", hbc*creal(Eini->v[idxini][idxi[i]]));
00161 
00162         for (f=0; f<Efin->ngood[idxfin]; f++) {
00163           fprintf(fp, "\n%10.3f MeV", hbc*creal(Efin->v[idxfin][idxf[f]]));
00164           for (i=0; i<Eini->ngood[idxini]; i++) {
00165             B = SQR(gagv)*(jfin+1.0)/(jini+1.0)*
00166               SQR(cabs(transme[idxfin][idxini][idxf[f]][idxi[i]]))/
00167               cabs(Efin->norm[idxfin][idxf[f]]*Eini->norm[idxini][idxi[i]]);
00168             if (creal(Efin->v[idxfin][idxf[f]]) < creal(Eini->v[idxini][idxi[i]]))
00169               fprintf(fp, "%10.5f    ", B);
00170             else
00171               fprintf(fp, "%10.5f *  ", B);
00172           }
00173         }
00174         fprintf(fp, "\n");      
00175       }
00176     }
00177 }

00179 
00180 void writeprojectedtransitionGTplus(FILE* fp,
00181                                     const Projection* P,
00182                                     const complex double**** gtp,
00183                                     const Eigenstates* Efin, 
00184                                     const Eigenstates* Eini)
00185 {
00186   fprintf(fp, "\n ########### Gamov Teller plus transitions\n");
00187   writeprojectedtransitions(fp, P, 2, 0, "B(GT+)", "", gtp, Efin, Eini);
00188 }
00189 
00190 void writeprojectedtransitionGTminus(FILE* fp,
00191                                      const Projection* P,
00192                                      const complex double**** gtm,
00193                                      const Eigenstates* Efin, 
00194                                      const Eigenstates* Eini)
00195 {
00196   fprintf(fp, "\n ########### Gamov Teller minus transitions\n");
00197   writeprojectedtransitions(fp, P, 2, 0, "B(GT-)", "", gtm, Efin, Eini);
00198 }
